item.title: resruby - CyberSpace CTF 2024
item.description:
<![CDATA[
I partecipated to the first edition ofCyberSpace CTF with@TheRomanXpl0it . It’s always nice to see some jail challenges so, I decided to write a writeup for the challenge I liked the most: resruby.]]>
